Element.Purpose: This demonstration shows how the VIE framework allows web developers to offer interaction with semantic content in a web interface.
Element.Use:
To start working with the demonstration choose an entity, for which you would like to find an image. Each entity is highlighted with blue.
Click the entity.
The set of found images will appear below the article.

Element.Purpose: Such a form of the text allows to extend the knowledge about the content.
Element.Processing: It contains hidden attributes, which can describe the instance itself and also it relations with other instances.
